response.overview: The old man says, ‘I’ve told the story of my whole life.’ But nevertheless, he is determined to live a full life until the very end.  A group of young men say, ‘Our stories have just begun’. However, they feel lost and insecure. They have no idea where their lives are heading towards. Their paths come across one another in a crumbling old photography studio in a big city where it’s losing its place. In there, they gradually come to grasp the meaning of life….
response.title: Not Now But When
